quoteText:
Changes to the TOS

DiscourseHosting reserves the right to amend any or all of the above policies, guidelines and disclaimer upon thirty (30) days prior written notice to you.
title: When the service wants to change its Terms of Service, users are notified a month or more in advance

tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance
tosdr.tldr: As stated in the Terms of Service, DiscourseHosting reserves the right to amend any or all of the above policies, guidelines and disclaimer upon thirty (30) days prior written notice to you.
